Retrieves Altmerics Data For Any Published Paper From Altmetric.com

Documentation for package ‘rAltmetric’ version 0.6

  • DESCRIPTION file.
  • User guides, package vignettes and other documentation.
  • Package NEWS.

Help Pages

altmetrics Grab altmetric data on any paper
altmetric_data Returns a data frame of metrics for a paper
plot.altmetric Plots metrics for an altmetric object
print.altmetric Print a summary for an altmetric object
